meanings.definition: A region or part of a town, a country, or the world.
meanings.sent1: The playground is a fun areae for children to play in.
meanings.sent2: She explored the different areae of the city during her vacation.
meanings.sent3: The areae around the park was filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: His mind wandered to distant areae of imagination.
meanings.sent5: The vast areae of the desert stretched out before them.

meanings.definition: A subject or range of activity or knowledge.
meanings.sent1: Mathematics is a challenging areae for many students.
meanings.sent2: She excelled in the areae of science and research.
meanings.sent3: The areae of history always fascinated him with its tales.
meanings.sent4: Her expertise in the areae of technology was well-known.
meanings.sent5: Exploring new areae of learning can be exciting and rewarding.

meanings.definition: A space allocated for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The designated areae for parking was clearly marked.
meanings.sent2: She organized her work materials in the designated areae.
meanings.sent3: The areae for the event was beautifully decorated.
meanings.sent4: He found a cozy areae in the library to read his book.
meanings.sent5: The play areae in the park was filled with laughter and playfulness.
